s.text: "An event with a one-in-a-million chance of happening to any American on any given day will, in fact, occur 260 times each day in this country," notes mathematician John Allen Paulos ( NYT ), who argues that the EgyptAir crash was almost certainly a random event.

"An event with a one-in-a-million chance of happening to any American on any given day will, in fact, occur 260 times each day in this country," notes mathematician John Allen Paulos ( NYT ), who argues that the EgyptAir crash was almost certainly a random event.
